name: An Onion's Quest
description:
Join Onion in this adventure 2D/3D shoot-'em-up mini game!

This is our submission for the 2023 edition of the Boss Rush Game Jam - https://itch.io/jam/boss-rush-jam-2023

For the best experience, we recommend downloading the Windows version of the game. 

INSTRUCTIONS

Move with arrows or AD (gamepad left stick)

Jump/crouch - up/down arrow or SW  (PS4 gamepad x, button west)

Shoot -  mouse left click (gamepad button east)

Aim - Middle mouse button (gamepad right shoulder)

Patch up - mouse right click and hold or E key (gamepad button north)

CREDITS 

Programming - Marco Minganna 

2D artist - Lucia Paganini http://www.lucisaurus.com/

3D artist - Gabriele Favaretto https://www.gabrielefavaretto3disasters.com

Music & Sound effects - Massimo Falanga
